filmography.title: The Westerner
filmography.role_description: A young homesteader who is killed early in the film, marking Andrews' first credited screen role.
filmography.plot: A drifter is brought before the hanging judge Roy Bean, but talks his way out of it by claiming to know the judge's idol, Lillie Langtry.

filmography.title: Tobacco Road
filmography.role_description: The former owner of the land who returns to tell the sharecroppers they must leave or pay rent.
filmography.plot: A poor sharecropper family in the rural South struggles to keep their farm during the Great Depression.

filmography.title: Ball of Fire
filmography.role_description: A smooth-talking gangster who hides his girlfriend (Barbara Stanwyck) with a group of naive professors.
filmography.plot: A group of professors working on a new encyclopedia encounter a mouthy nightclub singer who is wanted by the police to testify against her mobster boyfriend.

filmography.title: Swamp Water
filmography.role_description: A young trapper who discovers a fugitive hiding in the Okefenokee Swamp and agrees to help him.
filmography.plot: A trapper discovers a fugitive hiding in the dangerous Okefenokee Swamp and falls in love with his daughter.

filmography.title: The Ox-Bow Incident
filmography.role_description: An innocent rancher who is wrongly accused of cattle rustling and faces a lynch mob with dignified desperation.
filmography.plot: Two drifters are passing through a Western town when news comes in that a local rancher has been murdered and his cattle stolen, leading to mob justice.

filmography.title: The North Star
filmography.role_description: A Soviet bomber pilot who fights to defend his Ukrainian village from the invading Nazi army.
filmography.plot: Residents of a Ukrainian village organize a resistance movement against the invading Nazi forces.

filmography.title: The Purple Heart
filmography.role_description: The commanding officer of a bomber crew captured by the Japanese, who tries to protect his men during a show trial.
filmography.plot: After bombing Tokyo, an American flight crew is captured and put on trial by the Japanese government.

filmography.title: Wing and a Prayer
filmography.role_description: A dedicated carrier pilot who clashes with his commander over flight safety and mission strategy.
filmography.plot: After the attack on Pearl Harbor, an aircraft carrier is sent on a decoy mission to trick the Japanese fleet.

filmography.title: Laura
filmography.role_description: A tough, hard-boiled detective who falls in love with the portrait of the murder victim he is investigating.
filmography.plot: A police detective falls in love with the woman whose murder he is investigating.

filmography.title: State Fair
filmography.role_description: A cynical newspaper reporter covering the Iowa State Fair who falls for a farm girl.
filmography.plot: The Frake family attends the Iowa State Fair, where the parents seek prizes and the children find romance.

filmography.title: A Walk in the Sun
filmography.role_description: The reluctant leader of a platoon in Italy who must take command after his superiors become casualties.
filmography.plot: A platoon of American soldiers tramps through the Italian countryside on a mission to take a farmhouse from the Nazis.

filmography.title: Fallen Angel
filmography.role_description: A drifter who marries a wealthy woman to steal her money but ends up framed for the murder of a waitress.
filmography.plot: A drifter marries a small-town girl for her money, planning to divorce her and run off with a waitress, who turns up murdered.

filmography.title: Canyon Passage
filmography.role_description: An ambitious freight company owner in 1850s Oregon who balances business, romance, and frontier justice.
filmography.plot: A mule freight owner in 1856 Oregon balances business, romance, and Native American uprisings.

filmography.title: The Best Years of Our Lives
filmography.role_description: A decorated bombardier who returns home to a loveless marriage and a dead-end job as a soda jerk.
filmography.plot: Three WWII veterans return home to small-town America to discover that they and their families have changed.
filmography.awards: Oscar: Win – Best Picture; National Film Registry (Inducted 1989)

filmography.title: Boomerang!
filmography.role_description: A principled state's attorney who risks his career to prove the innocence of a man accused of murdering a priest.
filmography.plot: A prosecutor faces political pressure to convict a vagrant for the murder of a beloved priest, but he believes the man is innocent.
filmography.awards: National Board of Review: Top Ten Films

filmography.title: Daisy Kenyon
filmography.role_description: A smooth-talking, married lawyer who engages in a love triangle with a commercial artist and a war veteran.
filmography.plot: A commercial artist finds herself torn between a married lawyer she has been seeing and a returning war veteran.

filmography.title: The Iron Curtain
filmography.role_description: A Soviet cipher clerk stationed in Canada who decides to defect and expose a spy ring.
filmography.plot: A code clerk at the Soviet embassy in Ottawa defects with documents exposing a Soviet spy ring.

filmography.title: My Foolish Heart
filmography.role_description: A charming playboy whose tragic romance with a young woman leads to her unhappy life choices.
filmography.plot: A woman's unhappy marriage triggers memories of her true love, a soldier who was killed during World War II.

filmography.title: Where the Sidewalk Ends
filmography.role_description: A brutal police detective who accidentally kills a suspect and tries to frame a gang leader for the crime.
filmography.plot: A police detective accidentally kills a suspect and tries to pin it on a gang leader, but falls for the suspect's widow.

filmography.title: Elephant Walk
filmography.role_description: A plantation overseer in Ceylon who falls in love with his boss's new wife amidst a cholera epidemic and elephant stampede.
filmography.plot: A young bride accompanies her husband to his tea plantation in Ceylon, only to find him dominated by his late father's memory.

filmography.title: While the City Sleeps
filmography.role_description: A star television reporter who orchestrates a manhunt for a serial killer while navigating office politics.
filmography.plot: Reporters at a newspaper compete to catch a serial killer, using their women as bait to get the scoop.

filmography.title: Beyond a Reasonable Doubt
filmography.role_description: A novelist who frames himself for a murder to prove the flaws of capital punishment, but the plan goes wrong.
filmography.plot: A writer frames himself for a murder to prove the insufficiency of circumstantial evidence, but finds himself unable to prove his innocence.

filmography.title: Night of the Demon
filmography.role_description: An American psychologist and skeptic who investigates a satanic cult leader in England, only to be confronted with real supernatural terror.
filmography.plot: An American psychologist investigates a satanic cult leader who has the power to summon a demon.
filmography.awards: Horror Classic (aka Curse of the Demon)

filmography.title: Zero Hour!
filmography.role_description: A traumatized ex-pilot who must land a passenger plane when the crew gets food poisoning; the basis for the spoof 'Airplane!'.
filmography.plot: A pilot with a fear of flying must land an airliner after the crew becomes incapacitated by food poisoning.

filmography.title: The Last Tycoon
filmography.role_description: A film director struggling with the studio system in this adaptation of F. Scott Fitzgerald's unfinished novel.
filmography.plot: A Hollywood studio executive slowly works himself to death while navigating industry politics and a doomed romance.

filmography.title: Airport 1975
filmography.role_description: A businessman piloting a small private plane that collides with a 747, setting off the disaster.
filmography.plot: A 747 is struck by a small plane, leaving the flight crew dead or incapacitated, and a stewardess must fly the plane.
